comment.author: 8892367@N05
comment._content: See a blog post featuring this photograph at THE BIGGER PICTURE.

comment.author: 41380738@N05
comment._content: What a fun picture of Mr. Pauling! I've actually never seen this one before. I assume he is trying to demonstrating either the alpha-helix on a peptide chain or DNA using the rope here. His DNA model was wrong, but he got the Nobel Prize for solving the alpha-helix.

comment.author: 40999618@N05
comment._content: My chemistry professor, long time ago, was a fan of Dr. Pauling. Nice picture.

comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Cute picture. Copied to commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Linus_Pauling_with_rope.jpg Too bad we don't know more about the photo... Thanks for posting these!
